verses.verse: <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> fell <S%H5307>down<s%> through the <S%H7639>lattice<s%> in his upper <S%H5944>room<s%> that was in <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and was <S%H2470>sick.<s%> So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>them,<s%> "Go, <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal <S%H1176>Zebub,<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> whether I will <S%H2421>recover<s%> of this <S%H2483>sickness.<s%>"

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H430>them,<s%> 'Is it because there is no God in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal <S%H1176>Zebub,<s%> the <S%H1980>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron?<s%>

Now therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "You shall not come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H4296>bed<s%> where you have gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>"'" <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3212>departed.<s%>
The <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and he said to <S%H2088>them,<s%> "Why is it that you have <S%H7725>returned?<s%>"

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> "A man <S%H5927>came<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>us,<s%> and said to <S%H3212>us,<s%> 'Go, <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> who <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1696>you,<s%> and tell <S%H1696>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'Is it because there is no God in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal <S%H1176>Zebub,<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron?<s%> Therefore you shall not come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H4296>bed<s%> where you have gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>'"'"
He <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4941>them,<s%> "What kind of <S%H376>man<s%> was he who came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1696>you,<s%> and told you these <S%H1697>words?<s%>"

They <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H8181>him,<s%> "He was a hairy <S%H1167>man,<s%> and <S%H247>wearing<s%> a <S%H5785>leather<s%> <S%H232>belt<s%> around his <S%H4975>waist.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty<s%> to <S%H5927>him.<s%> He went up to <S%H3427>him;<s%> and behold, he was sitting on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill.<s%> He <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> "Man of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H3381><s%> 'Come down!'"

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1696>to<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> "If I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty!<s%>" <S%H784>Fire<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

<S%H7725>Again<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> He <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1696>him,<s%> <S%H376>"Man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H6030>said,<s%> <S%H3381><s%> 'Come down <S%H4120>quickly!<s%>'"

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1696>them,<s%> "If I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty!<s%>" The <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

<S%H7725>Again<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of a <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> The <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3766>fell<s%> on his <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H2603>begged<s%> <S%H1696>him,<s%> and said to <S%H376>him,<s%> "Man of <S%H430>God,<s%> please let my <S%H5315>life,<s%> and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of these <S%H2572>fifty<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

<S%H784>Behold,<s%> fire <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with their <S%H2572>fifties.<s%> But now let my <S%H5315>life<s%> be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> "Go <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H3372>him.<s%> Don't be afraid of <S%H6440>him.<s%>" He <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> with him to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

He <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H1696>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7971><s%> 'Because you have sent <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Baal <S%H1176>Zebub,<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> is it because there is no <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of his <S%H1697>word?<s%> Therefore you shall not come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H4296>bed<s%> where you have gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>'"

So he <S%H4191>died<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%> in his place in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> because he had no <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> which he <S%H6213>did,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
